decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been provided with regards to the Construction Management Plan. Officers are therefore unable to confirm the proposed would safeguard the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers and in the interests of the safety and operation of the highway network, in accordance with policies T4 and T7 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS7, DM9 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 10 (landscaping) and have therfore failed to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 11 (Drainage). Therefore, the proposal would fail to prevent the risk of flooding to and from the site in accordance with policy SI13 of the London Plan 2021, the Sustainable Design and Construction SPG 2014, the Non-Statutory Technical Standards for Sustainable Drainage Systems 2015 and policy DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Details required for Condition 4 (construction management plan), 5 (Fire Safety Strategy), 6 (waste and recycling facilities), 7 (cycle parking facilities), 10 (landscaping scheme), 11 (drainage design), 12 (sustainability and energy conservation), 14 (nature conservation) of planning permission 22/00561/FUL (Erection of attached two-storey dwelling with associated parking, cycle and refuse stores incorporating rear dormer and ground floor extension to match proposed single storey rear extension and hip to gable and rear dormer extensions (with 3no. rooflights to front roofslope) to existing dwelling (following demolition of existing outbuildings))
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
